summary: While recovering in Venice, sickly Composer Gustav von Aschenbach becomes dangerously fixated with teenager Tadzio.
cast: Dirk Bogarde|Romolo Valli|Mark Burns|Nora Ricci|Marisa Berenson|Carole André|Björn Andrésen|Silvana Mangano|Leslie French|Franco Fabrizi|Antonio Appicella|Sergio Garfagnoli|Ciro Cristofoletti|Luigi Battaglia|Dominique Darel|Masha Predit|Eva Axén|Marcello Bonini Olas|Bruno Boschetti|Nicoletta Elmi|John Fordyce|Karl Menzel|Mirella Pamphili|Marco Tulli
title: Muerte en Venecia
